comments:
If I attempt to run it from a remote X client, it
throws an exception during launch and freezes.

I'm using the latest release build (20011127?).  It's only from NTs
with Xwin32 (both 3.4.1 and 4.1.4).  No problems from one Linux box or Solaris 
to another either.

The exception follows:

Confirmed on RedHat Linux 6.2, kernel 2.2.19. Sun jdk 1.3.1_02. Running X-
server on Windows ME host.

The method ImageData.stretch1 no longer exists. SQ rewrote all of that code in 
Image a while ago. The given error cannot possibly occur, so I am closing this 
PR and marking it "obsolete". If there are still problems running eclipse on 
Xwin32, please open a new bug report with the current details or stack trace.
